title: What we do hits HOME. Incredible 1 Bedroom Apt Just for You
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, give us a call or email at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to check-out our video tours & see options to contact us directly.
Your search has brought you to the right place.
Lakeside Pointe Apartments is the perfect place for affordable, quality, and comfortable living in the Pearland area.
The location of our community is unbeatable.
Located near several dining, entertainment and shopping options, Lakeside Pointe makes it convenient to adventure around to all the local hot spots.
Our property provides 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments and townhomes to our residents.
We are experts at providing you with a place to make you feel at home.
We offer many amenities in our community, including an outdoor swimming pool, community club house, outdoor playground, and a business center.
Apartment amenities include but are not limited to a private patio or balcony, washer and dryer connections, 9’ ceilings, and large walk-in closets.
Lakeside Pointe Apartments is the place to be.
Be sure to call today and schedule a tour!
- Double Bathroom Vanity with Large Soaking Tub
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Lakeside Pointe participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $44,940 | 2
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
NOTE: Wednesday tours by appointment only.
Please contact the Management Office to schedule a tour.
Call today to learn more about our community:
